website_summaries.verdict: With indoor and outdoor wheels, your child can practice for the rink at home. Precision speed bearings give them an extra kick.
pros: Comes with a pair of pink and pair of white laces
cons: Wheels do not roll continuously like more professional roller skates

customer_reviews.title: Quality Skates!
customer_reviews.text: The skate body is well made, the inside is well padded; the wheel assembly results in a movement that is super smooth....my 5 year old grandson cannot skate off the carpet onto the wood floor and stay upright...yet. He is working on it. This is a compliment. The movement is what you would expect from a good roller rink skate. Overall, we are very pleased with the skates.
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: Your kids needs these!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are one of the best gifts I bought for my kids. These skates feel durable and well made. Perfect gift for kids to stay active and get exercise without forcing them. I have three pairs. Go get you some already!
customer_reviews.author: JGerardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 yr old grand daughter for Christmas and they were perfect! Bought the same size she wears in shoes and they fit her perfect. Haven't had a chance to see how they do at the rink yet but around the house they are great. Would highly recommend these skates.
customer_reviews.author: rs12659

customer_reviews.title: Not good for outside
customer_reviews.text: Very nice indoor skate. Would not recommend for outdoor unless you have outdoor wheels
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I have taken my kids skating every week since they were 3. It was time for bigger and these are great skates for the price. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: best skates
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nice product i like it very much. thank you very much i highly recommend buy buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Yervand Papazyan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good style. Ease of use for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... yr old grand daughter for Christmas and they were perfect! Bought one size more the one she wears ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 yr old grand daughter for Christmas and they were perfect! Bought one size more the one she wears in shoes and they fit her perfect. She uses them indoor ant outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: CeciliaG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and has received multiple compliments every time she uses them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lefever

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cute these are. My 7yo stepdaughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Patsy McKinney

product_meta.title: Epic Skates Galaxy Elite Kids Quad Speed Skates
product_meta.description: Epic Galaxy skates feature a mid-top design to give skates the feel and comfort of a low-top boot with the ankle support and protection of a high-top.
feature_bullets: Comes with 2 Pair of Laces - White & Pink
Boots - Pink Epic Galaxy - Utilizes a mid-top design Comfortable padded collar Man-made uppers Adjustable speed strap
Wheels - Epic Galaxy Indoor / Outdoor Wheels - Toe Stops Non-adjustable / Non-marking Toe Stops
Plates - Epic Nylon - Lightweight nylon plate - Double action trucks

specifications.Manufacturer: Josey Skateland, Inc DBA Epic Skates
